snippet: A German television crew filming in a village near Beijing was assaulted by men in four vehicles who tried to run the crew’s minivan off the road, said one of the correspondents.
lead_paragraph: A German television crew filming in a village near Beijing was assaulted by men in four vehicles who tried to run the crew’s minivan off the road, said one of the correspondents.

headline.main: China: German Journalists Say They Were Assaulted for Filming
headline.print_headline: China: German Journalists Say They Were Assaulted for Filming
